story_text: Anna has a big red apple and a small ant on her hand.
The ant wants to taste the apple, and Anna is happy to share.
story_images: A little girl named Anna holding a bright red apple with a tiny black ant on her hand.
Anna smiling as the tiny ant climbs towards the shiny red apple.

questions.question: What does Anna have on her hand?
choices: A red apple and an ant
questions.answer: A red apple and an ant

questions.question: Who wants to taste the apple?
